### [**Biography**]{.smallcaps}

| Welcome to my personal webpage. I'm delighted to share my academic journey with you!
| 
| I am pursuing a Master's degree in Epidemiology at [Johns Hopkins University](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/) (since 2023). During this period, I served as a research assistant under the guidance of [Prof. Jennifer Schrack](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/faculty/2686/jennifer-a-schrack) and [Prof. Ciprian Crainiceanu](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/faculty/1442/ciprian-m-crainiceanu). I'm also fortunate to collaborate with [Prof. John Muschelli](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/faculty/2438/john-muschelli).
| 
| Prior to this, I underwent a year of Biostatistics Master training at [Renmin University of China](http://stat.ruc.edu.cn/Home/index.htm) (2022-2023) under the guidance of [A. Prof. Yu Wang](http://stat.ruc.edu.cn/Home/People/Faculty/01eb35dbf5fe41588f82d3150ffcf409.htm). My academic journey began with a B.Eng degree (2018-2022) earned at [Zhejiang University](https://www.zju.edu.cn/english/), where I was under the supervision of [Prof. Yu Zhang](https://person.zju.edu.cn/en/yzhang#0). I felt lucky to have engaged in research collaborations with [Prof. Ming Chen](https://bis.zju.edu.cn/binfo/), [Prof. Baiyi Lu](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Baiyi-Lu-2), and [A. Prof. Li Li](https://person.zju.edu.cn/en/lili). I am dedicated to enhance my professional skills in the combination field of **BIOS & BIOINFO & EPI** and cultivate the ability of innovation.

### [**Research Interest (**]{.smallcaps}[More](https://sngao.github.io/Sunan-Gao/about.html)[**)**]{.smallcaps}

I am intrigued by the integration of aging indicators (e.g. frailty, biological age), digital biomarkers (e.g. wearable measurement), age-related disease (e.g. Dementia, CVD), and omics (e.g. Metabonomics, Metagenomics, GWAS).

Furthermore, exploring biostatistical (e.g. causal inference, functional data) and data science (e.g. transfer learning, deep learning) methods also drive my interest.
